data.name: X4: Foundations Collector's Edition - Extra Content
data.detailed_description:
The X4: Foundations Collector's Edition Content includes:
  • Access to the first two expansions for X4: Foundations: X4: Split Vendetta (2020) and X4: Cradle of Humanity (2021)
  • The X Universe Digital Artbook 2018: Enjoy the concept art behind the X universe.
  • X Novel: Nopileos by Helge Kautz as English and German eBook.
  • Digital Soundtrack: Download the music, including exclusive versions of the trailer and teaser music in highest possible quality, for X4: Foundations, X4: Split Vendetta and X4: Cradle of Humanity.
  • X Encyclopedia

The bonus content will be placed in your X4 installation folder:
...Steam\SteamApps\common\X4 Foundations\Bonus Content

data.short_description: Bonus content for X4: Foundations and access to the first two expansions.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Russian*, Korean, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America, Polish
*languages with full audio support
